title: Weekly Digest (26 July, 2020 - 2 August, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 30 issues were created.
Of these, 14 issues have been closed and 16 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #11025 [[keycard] Enter pairing code screen doesn't hint the paring code format to the user](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11025), by [johnlea-quiup](https://github.com/johnlea-quiup)
:green_heart: #11024 [Bump elliptic from 6.5.2 to 6.5.3](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11024), by [dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot)
:green_heart: #11022 [Error appears if start to type from the dot any name during "Start new chat" flow ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11022), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11021 [Add local notification for referee of referral program](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11021), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11020 [Handle offline state for (Emoji) reactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11020), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #11017 [Search field and chat list on Home view disappear after pasting name of new chat (you didn't join it before) if don't set focus in search field first](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11017), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11016 [replace camera library](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11016), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #11015 [Search input on Home screen is not cleared after entering chat's name, opening chat from suggestions and turning back](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11015), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11014 [WIP Add universal qr scanner](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11014), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #11013 [Search input and chat list on Home screen disappear after deleting public chat if navigating from suggestions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11013), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11010 [Research a way to avoid pulling in Play Services/Firebase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11010), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #11008 [add F-Droid update README file](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11008), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #11007 [[#9986] Allow to disable fetching of tx history on mobile network](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11007), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #11006 [[Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11006), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:green_heart: #11003 [3-random name in push notification from user with ENS username](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11003), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #11001 [Push notification doesnâ€™t disappear after opening a chat via application shortcut (not via the notification itself)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11001), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #11023 [After upgrade from 1.4.1 to Nightly 31/07/20 all chat history is empty](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11023), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:heart: #11019 [nix: allow XCode versions 11.5 and higher](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11019), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #11018 [[TESTS] align e2e with reactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11018), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #11012 [Feature/test ios pn without lib](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11012), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #11011 [[#10976] Fix crash on kk login with enabled fingerprint](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11011), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #11009 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11009), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #11005 [[TESTS] updated e2e - PNs, set max](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11005), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #11004 [F-Droid build enabling changes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11004), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #11002 [image reply fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11002), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #11000 [[#10975] Missing translation on Keycard login page](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11000), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10999 [fix scan qr window](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10999), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10998 [set max button in dark mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10998), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10997 [[#10988] Add entry point to start new chat from search results ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10997), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10996 [Wallet/Sticker market/command transaction components](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10996), by [emizzle](https://github.com/emizzle)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #11004 [F-Droid build enabling changes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11004), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x2 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #11010 [Research a way to avoid pulling in Play Services/Firebase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/11010), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
It received 12 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 25 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 10 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #11024 [Bump elliptic from 6.5.2 to 6.5.3](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11024), by [dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot)
:yellow_heart: #11016 [replace camera library](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11016), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #11014 [WIP Add universal qr scanner](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11014), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #11008 [add F-Droid update README file](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11008), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #11007 [[#9986] Allow to disable fetching of tx history on mobile network](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11007), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #11006 [[Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11006), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:yellow_heart: #10937 [[WIP] [#10179] Create invite link for group chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10937), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10935 [[WIP] ios pn](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10935), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10923 [fix tokens validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10923), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10620 [Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #11019 [nix: allow XCode versions 11.5 and higher](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11019), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #11018 [[TESTS] align e2e with reactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11018), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #11011 [[#10976] Fix crash on kk login with enabled fingerprint](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11011), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #11009 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11009), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #11005 [[TESTS] updated e2e - PNs, set max](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11005), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #11004 [F-Droid build enabling changes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11004), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #11002 [image reply fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11002), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #11000 [[#10975] Missing translation on Keycard login page](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11000), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10999 [fix scan qr window](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10999), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10998 [set max button in dark mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10998), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10997 [[#10988] Add entry point to start new chat from search results ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10997), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10987 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10987), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #10955 [[#10195] Delete multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10955), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

# COMMITS
Last week there were 18 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [align e2e with reactions  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d0ce6f11d86ce3d84b44ff5e101a77ea7a7332ac) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Emoji reactions  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1c308c2d0128e8f74d08e1fa2e317c57da9aeae3) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: allow XCode versions 11.5 and higher  This is kinda hacky, but is simple enough since the version check uses grep.  For details see: https://github.com/status-im/nixpkgs/blob/status-mods/pkgs/development/mobile/xcodeenv/compose-xcodewrapper.nix  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/933c0f8f8cc8eaee6380a079cd95d054e1fa49c5) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update translations  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8b99e992ad0245eeb7a9ed57b861ad92ca3c698d) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10976] Fix crash on kk login with enabled fingerprint](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e96fc901992a1687f2350f97c4589afcd75e471e) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10988] Add entry point to start new chat from search results  Fixes #10988  Allow public key and filter public chats  Make toolbar width 100  Clear new identity from search  QA issues fix  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8652f899e02f3962dd61ed202a0eeab018b9b90d) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e for PN and set max  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/56364ea70c67b1e52a19978484ab9e45b10d8a9a) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)

:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: disable Gradle daemon for builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/517a1be27ce97d785018c8fbb51870579b33b6e7) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: set GRADLE_USER_HOME to a temp dir  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8bb99743a79b1c063ad5ab834e886231e88816d6) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

:hammer_and_wrench: [audio messages  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/86700f2b5c666723516e5fadc1c8b2a216f2ab14) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
